heading: HB02623
0: AN ACT PROVIDING CIVIL SERVICE ELIGIBILITY AND PERMANENT APPOINTMENT TO ALL GOVERNMENT CASUAL AND CONTRACTUAL EMPLOYEES UNDER JOB ORDERS, CONTRACT OF SERVICE, MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT/MEMORANDUM ORDER OR UNDERSTANDING AND OTHER SIMILAR CONTRACTS WHO HAVE RENDERED AT LEAST FIVE (5) YEARS OF OUTSTANDING GOVERNMENT SERVICE
status: Pending with the Committee on CIVIL SERVICE AND PROFESSIONAL REGULATION since 2019-07-31
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02623
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING CIVIL SERVICE ELIGIBILITY AND PERMANENT APPOINTMENT TO ALL GOVERNMENT CASUAL AND CONTRACTUAL EMPLOYEES UNDER JOB ORDERS, CONTRACT OF SERVICE, MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT/MEMORANDUM ORDER OR UNDERSTANDING AND OTHER SIMILAR CONTRACTS WHO HAVE RENDERED AT LEAST FIVE (5) YEARS OF OUTSTANDING GOVERNMENT SERVICE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MENDOZA, RAYMUND DEMOCRITO C.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-24
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON CIVIL SERVICE AND PROFESSIONAL REGULATION ON 2019-07-31
